item.title: ACM SIGSOFT Distinguished Paper Award
item.description: Award received for an authored ICSE paper regarding a theory on the identification of design problems in the source code. ICSE is the world’s main conference in the field of software engineering. In 40 years of ICSE this was the second time that a paper from Brazil receives such distinction. Paper: Identifying Design Problems in the Source Code: A Grounded Theory.
